description:
*** ON SALE FOR LIMITED TIME ***

*** New 3D arcade action game from the makers of webOS hit Putki *** Supersonic is an adrenaline-charged 3D tunnel ride game for Palm Veer. Blaze through four levels at ever faster speeds, accompanied by electronic beats from Finnish artist collective Kitkaliitto. The ultimate challenge comes in the 30-second Blitz mode with speed boosts, time extends and other special collectibles.

HIGHLIGHTS:

- High speed 3D tunnel ride game
- Levels designed to the rhythm of electronic music by Kitkaliitto (www.kitkaliitto.com)
- Four auto-accelerating classic levels with walls and score bonuses
- Blazing 30-second Blitz mode with speed boosts, time extends and other special collectibles
- Earn game credits to purchase power-ups for Blitz mode
- Cutting edge riders can compete for a place on the weekly Top 50 list

WHAT'S BEING SAID ABOUT SUPERSONIC:

"A must have... highlights accelerometer and the pre's awesome 3-D graphics. Reminds me something of a new age Tron!!!"

"Top of the list out of all my games!"

"Addictive racing game. Perfect performance on Pre 2."

"This game is fantastic, especially if you immerse yourself in it. Lie on your back with headphones in the dark and you'll be blown away with the immersive smooth 3D experience you can get out of a little smartphone!! Much more engaging than any 3D driving game! Kudos!"

"It's Putki madness all over again... on acid. Massive improvements, great visuals and nice soundtrack."

SUPPORT:

Please report issues to http://support.kuuasema.com/supersonic. Comments sent to App Catalog can't be replied to. Please send issues with downloading directly to Palm.
